page.description: The label for the variance value row in the Grid.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Variance value label]* property defines what is shown in the variance value row of the Grid Component. The variance row is only shown when the *[ui:Variance]* property in the [Summary values] section for one or more fields has been checked.
The default value of *[ui:Variance value]* is "Variance".
